# Cart Investments Sulphur Ops - Streamlit Application

## Project Overview
A Streamlit-based operations dashboard for managing sulphur cart investments. Tracks sales orders, truck trips, communications, and monthly allocations with SQLite backend.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Streamlit app with SQLite database
